holes.original_proof:
cases h2 with
| inl h2 =>
  have h3 := congr_arg (fun x => x 0) h2
  have h4 := congr_arg (fun x => x 1) h2
  have h5 := congr_arg (fun x => x 2) h2
  simp [cross_apply, Matrix.cons_val_zero, Matrix.cons_val_succ, Matrix.head_cons, Fin.val_zero, Fin.val_succ, mul_zero,
        sub_zero, add_zero, zero_add] at h3 h4 h5 <;>
      simp_all [Matrix.ext_iff, Fin.forall_fin_succ, Function.funext_iff] <;>
    aesop
| inr h2 =>
  have h3 := congr_arg (fun x => x 0) h2
  have h4 := congr_arg (fun x => x 1) h2
  have h5 := congr_arg (fun x => x 2) h2
  simp [cross_apply, Matrix.cons_val_zero, Matrix.cons_val_succ, Matrix.head_cons, Fin.val_zero, Fin.val_succ, mul_zero,
        sub_zero, add_zero, zero_add] at h3 h4 h5 <;>
      simp_all [Matrix.ext_iff, Fin.forall_fin_succ, Function.funext_iff] <;>
    aesop

rw [h4, h5]
ext k
fin_cases k
simp [cross_apply, Matrix.cons_val_zero, Matrix.cons_val_succ, Matrix.head_cons, Fin.val_zero, Fin.val_succ, mul_zero,
  sub_zero, add_zero, zero_add]
